nodes.text: Preemptive Strike was a roleplaying-game adventure in year five of the Living Force campaign. It was the first adventure in the For Every Action trilogy and was written by Rob Edwards and edited by Ron Heintz and Margaret Heintz.

The crime lord Riboga has returned to the Cularin system, and the heroes are sent to try and prevent him from taking over crime there. They counter his efforts on Dorumaa and Tolea Biqua, before stealing treasure from his asteroid base.
